page.title: 02Housing Survey 1985.
page.content:
Parents of children in some of our local primary schools took part in a survey to find out about housing in our area. We found that{51%}of families lived in{semi-detached {houses, 32%}in{detached}and the rest in{terraced houses, flats or cottages.
Most families{(79%)}had lived in their houses for 10 years or less. Almost all the houses{(96%)}had gardens and most{(58%)}had garages.
This suggests an area of{suburban} housing almost all with{gardens}and many with{garages.
Most families expressed themselves as being{'satisfied'}or{'very satisfied' with their houses.
